data.title: Recovery from Cults Help for Victims of Psychological and Spiritual Abuse by Michael D. Langone
data.meta_description: Find the best prices on Recovery from Cults Help for Victims of Psychological and Spiritual Abuse by Michael D. Langone at BIBLIO | Hardcover | Used - Good | 1994 | W. W. Norton & Company | 1st Edition | 9780393701647
data.text:
Used - Good

Description

410 Pages. Stated: First Edition. No dust jacket.This is an absolute must-have for anyone with a friend or a relative who has been encapsulated by a cult. The book's exterior has worn areas on the front and rear covers, on the spine, and a very lightly worn spot at the top of its spine. The interior book has lots of highlighting (but not throughout the book), some underlining, and a few notes written in the margins. Outside of these distractions though, all of the printing remains very readable and there aren't any other visible detriments and the book's bindings remain tight and therefore are sound. If you should order this very interesting and useful book from us, it will be carefully wrapped up, then it will be padded and boxed, and mailed right away to you with both tracking and insurance and will come with our absolute appreciation for your order.
